title: Release Date?
body: When can i be expecting to join the battle on the new Fields of Justice?

replies.body: Now (for PBE).
in the video you forgot to show the wraiths and golems. -_-
they are no longer wraiths and golems
there is no way they just removed them from game!

They did remove the presence of wraiths and golems because they felt that they did not capture the feel of summoners rift, they did however, add monsters with the same hp and damage. Like they said this is just a visual update, so you will still get everything you normally would from the wraiths and golems just in a monster that the art team thought looked good for the new update to summoners rift.
Yes but some people don't have PBE. When can EVERYONE play it?
If only I had access to that glorious land.

replying this here so some rioter will see it, i has an idea. why not add a graph/grid part that calculates true dmg as well? for champs like ahri (especially her) twitch, darius, and vayne this would help out a lot seeing how much true dmg you do over time rather than just dmg dealt total, and magic dmg done total (refrence to Ahri). just a thought but since so few champs do true dmg i wouldnt expect to see it made
you forgot to mention that anyone who takes {{summoner:14}} does true damage so this is even more important

Do you guys have a date or patch that you hope to have this update by or are you just going to put it in when it's ready?
(For the regular servers[Not PBE])
How do you play PBE??
Awesome!!!!

Will the World Championship be held on the new SR?

I figure that it might come out in time to catch any bugs and then be patched: ready for worlds.

You would think that, considering they're completely remaking summoner's rift, that they would think to stop giving the blue team bot lane an advantage. when you're trying to land skill shots on the purple team, it's like trying to shoot at a basketball net blindfolded if you don't know where the net is. rito plz... it makes me sad {{champion:32}}

They have actually adjusted the depth and angle of the camera to alleviate the issue with this to a certain extent. They also directly addressed this complaint in a few posts about the SR VU saying that the camera issue itself was not within the scope of the visual update and that the issue was being looked at separately.

This is very much a problem that I used to have and many new players have. Thats usually because their on auto lock. I literally (i shit you not) NEVER have a problem with being on purple side. I can land things just as easy as I can on blue because I move the camera a little bit down the lane to see what i'm aiming at. So to sum it all up... your doing it wrong if this was a true balance issue it would have been fixed.
Even if many play with an unlocked camera and don't have a problem, it is still a problem when the blue side has a win rate consistently higher than the purple team.

I would say that one of the main reasons for this stems from coop vs ai games. Due to the fact that you could only play blue side until recently so many people were/are uncomfortable on the purple side.
I am inclined to agree with you. If I am on purple side, I do not want to be EZ because of how it feels to land skill shots
I hope that this patch, won't a problem for fps
Ok this has been said countless times. This will be optimized BETTER than the current SR. So no, your FPS will actually be better.

how can we test anything or share feed back if its never on the pbe. since this was first announced there have been 4 patches on the pbe and people played on the map! If its finished enough to do that then you should make it available for people that have a pbe to check it out and play on it.
Or you could just be patient. They'll but it on PBE when they are ready for it.
Is it on PBE yet? :p

There was only a 400 mb patch on pbe so i doubt it, and i havent patched it for a while. checking now when its finished updating

Edit: Just checked and as expected it hasent hit pbe yet

It would be great if riot could give an approximate date about when it might go on the pbe
shouldnt expect it til after the 4.10 patch has been deployed they never do major updates or any updates at til when the current pbe patch ready to be sent to live
No it isn't.

{{champion:36}}

There's an update for PBE right now. By the file names, I can't really see anything specific to the SR update, or at least not yet. Crossing my fingers! If it's not released today then it probably will be tomorrow.
It isn't in today's update.

i wonder if {{champion:101}} is going to change
.he looks like the brother of the blue buff.
Why can't they just release it now as a **temporary "new" map**, and see if poeople like it. It would also be tested on a full scale, wouldn't it?
if i be good than riot say i get to play map today for fre

HEY, HOW ABOUT SOME OF YOU FUCKERS EXPLAIN HOW TO ACTUALLY "PLAYYYY" ON THE NEW MAP WITH INSTRUCTIONS OR LINKS TO GAIN ACCESS TO THE PBE SR?? CAUSE I CANT FIND SHIT. DO YOU LIKE FUCKING WITH US RIOT? SAYING, ITS OUT NOW!! WITH NO INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO ACTUALLY PLAY IT? WHEN PEOPLE ASK DO YOU ALL HAVE LUNCH AND BE LIKE "HEY, LOOK WHAT THAT SCRUB SAID, DOESNT EVEN KNOW HOW TO GET INTO THE PBE MAP" also, sometimes when i click on a skill to level, sometimes it doesnt register and you have to like, click the "+" symbol for like a second. that shit hurts my feelings riot. sometimes im getting tower dove, and i hit 6 and need to level my ult and that shits like, guess what berry bronze, BAM!! no ult for you. level it now that youre dead. same thing with shop sometimes. messing with my league is like playing with my emotions riot. youre not playing with my emotions are you riot? cause oooooo i sware to god
also i hope you guys shit the bed from time to time
LOLOL
You're asking if Riot has a release date............? Riot games? Ya give it a month or 2......maybe 6 like Aatrox
Made me laugh so hard.
how do get into the PBE
Firstly* :)
List of instructions. First is appropriate.

Yep. Sort of. Your first sentence started with "First," and your second sentence started with "after that." If you start a sentence with first (as in a list of instructions), the next step should start with "second." Your second sentence didn't sound right if started with "second." Therefore, the firstly/secondly pair would be a wiser choice than first/second.

Anyway, I checked the requirements for getting into the PBE. It turns out that you do not need a strong grasp on the English language in order to get in.
Will riot have to shut down the servers in order to be able to add the new rift into the game or will it be like another update?
It was another update; it just patched as of about 2 hours ago with the new SR in the files.
For PBE or PVP???/
